title: Stones River National Battlefield: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Welcome to your gateway for exploring the diverse historic and natural resources, and the stories connected to those resources, at Stones River National Battlefield. Use the links below to find out more about the park.                  Explore Nature & History               Living History Programs               Explore History & Culture on the battlefield.               Use the park as a classroom.               Learn about animals who call the park home.               Learn more about our monuments.                  History & Culture - Learn more about the people, places, and stories that tell us about thousands of years of people interacting with the park's landscapes.            Nature - Discover the diverse communities of plants and animals that populate the battlefield's landscapes.          VIP Buddy Secor   Photos & Multimedia - Enjoy an array of photographs and videos featuring the park's resources and stories.            Parks As Classrooms - Educators can choose from a variety of resources and programs to help students meet curriculum standards.            Kids & Youth - Discover the ways young visitors can explore, learn, and have fun in the park.
